Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CRS4C-3a (cryptdin-related sequence, CRS peptides, natural AMPs; mouse, rodents, mammals, animals; Other identical mature peptides: CRS4C-3b; CRS4C-3e; 4S=S in each unit,  homodimer via S-S; BBL)
Sequence Information.Crucial residues: Dimerization increases peptide activity by 2-4 fold.

Literature Information.Literature: CRS peptides do not have the same antimicrobial spectrum. Together, they provide a more effective protecting barrier to pathogen invasion.
